metadata.title: Pop Doggie Somebody Farted Boston Terrier Fridge Magnet
features: Boston Terriers are well known for having a particular side effect; this Boston Terrier innocently mentions that Somebody Farted
Boston Terrier magnet is 2 by 3 Inch and comes nicely displayed in protective packaging - perfect for gifts
Pop Doggie refrigerator magnets are Made in the USA out of metal with a thick laminate top
A portion of all profits will go to help paws in need
Show off your Boston Terrier pride or give as a great gift to a Boston Terrier lover
description: Boston terriers are well known for having a particular side effect. This Boston Terrier innocently mentions that "somebody farted." Boston Terrier magnet is 2 by 3 Inch and comes nicely displayed in protective packaging - perfect for gifts. Pop Doggie refrigerator magnets are made in the USA out of metal with a thick laminate top. A portion of all profits will go to help Paws in need. Show off your Boston Terrier pride or give as a great gift to a Boston Terrier lover.
